headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) Powers Ahead with Strategic Acquisitions and Analyst Upgrades
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the best Nancy Pelosi stocks to buy in 2026. On January 27, Vistra Energy (NYSE:VST) confirmed the closing of a $2.25 billion private offering. The offering consisted of $1 billion in 4.700% senior secured notes due 2031 and $1.25 billion in 5.350% notes due 2036. The company plans to […]
